attributes.action: Notify the Queen veto Parliaments power to vote on Brexit.
attributes.additional_details: "The will of the people shall be the basis of the authority of government"
attributes.background: Parliaments vote could delay or even stop Brexit. This undermines Democracy completely. We voted to leave & Queen Elizabeth needs to ensure the will of her people is followed.

rejection.details: This petition calls on the Queen, not the Government or Parliament, to take action.
